main event: A silver, circular object about 40 feet in diameter hovered over a farmer's field, landed briefly, then shot straight up into the sky.
interesting points: The object had no visible windows or doors and appeared to be one solid piece.
The object sat on the ground for 5-10 minutes before rapidly ascending.
The farmer could not identify the driver of a large sports car-type vehicle that was also seen in the area.
The report includes a questionnaire from the U.S. Air Force gathering details about the sighting, including time, location, weather conditions, and object characteristics.
The report mentions that the object was estimated to be the size of a house or larger and appeared to be self-luminous.
